summary: Alterante facial design for Ralof of Riverwood. More to come.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [size=32] WaywardKnight\'s Ralof of Riverwood [/b] [/size] 


[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/11145-1-1330632192.jpg [/img]


[b] Version 1.0 features : [/b] 

Several new looks for Ralof of Riverwood. More to come.  


[color=red] [b] Update #5 (26.02.12) : [/color] [/b] If you have any requests, please post them in the \"Requests\" topic. Thank you.

[color=red] [b] Update #4 (25.02.12) : [/color] [/b] Uploaded some more pictures of Old Ralof to give a sense of what he really looks like in proper lighting. 

[color=red] [b] Update #3 (25.02.12) : [/color] [/b] I have heard some people say that they have trouble switching between versions of the mod/installing new versions. 

To do so, follow these simple steps. It\'s very important you do so in the exact order. It will not work (to my knowledge) if you deviate from it in any way whatsoever : 

1. Uncheck Ralof.esp in NMM or the default launcher. Once that\'s done, close the launcher. 

2. Go into your Skyrim/Data directory. Once you\'re there, find and delete the following files: 

- Ralof.esp 
- 0002bf9d.nif, which can be found at : 

C:Program Files (x86)Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\characterfacegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm 

3. Re-install the version you\'d like to use. 

Thank you all for continued support + patience. 

[color=red] [b] Update #2 (24.02.12) :  [/color] [/b] Done. I\'m making a second version, this one a little more blonde.

Quick! What do you call 20 blondes trapped in a freeze spell? Frosted Flakes! 

Ugh. That was bad. But I promise my next updates won\'t be. I plan to beautify all the essential NPCs in the Helgen (except the kid ... whatshisface ...), with multiple options to choose from. Unfortunately, due to editor constraints, I can\'t change children, so the boy (Hammond, I think) won\'t be on the list. Him aside, all editable, non-random characters will be edited (unforseen circumstances aside). You have been warned!       

[color=red] [b] Update #1 (24.02.12) : [/color] [/b] Younger version as per requests (see downloads). Screenshots will be posted ASAP.  

[size=6] Savegames and presets available upon demand! [/size]


[b] To install : [/b] 

Simply copy and paste into your [i] skyrim/Data [/i] folder.


[b] To uninstall : [/b]

Delete Ralof.esp and the [i] .nif [/i] for Ralof, which can be found in : 

[i] C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facegeom\\skyrim.esm [/i]   


[b] To switch between versions : [/b]

1. Uncheck Ralof.esp in the Nexus Mod Manager or default Bethesda launcher. Once that\'s complete, close the launcher. 

2. Find and delete the following files (see above for location): 

[i] - Ralof.esp 
- the .nif that came with your Ralof [/i]  

3. Install the version you\'d like to use.  


[b] My other mods : [/b]

[b] WKC - Ralof : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11145

[b] WKC - Hadvar : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11136 

[b] WKC - Ulfric Stormcloak : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11404


[b] Recommended mods for male characters : [/b]  

[b] XCE (Xenius Character Enhancement) : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356

[b] Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

[b] High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox : [/b] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141  


[b] [size=6] More to come. [/b] [/size]  


[size=6] Lastly [/size] , my sponsor Vilod wishes to extend his limited buy-one-get-one-free \"mead-with-juniper-berries-mixed-in.\" Now you too can be sweet on a girl from here! Limit one per Dovahkiin. Customers are reminded that Imperial walls and towers DO NOT make you feel safe. For best results, serve cold and stay frosty. 

Fo Krah Diin! 


- WaywardKnight
author: WaywardKnight
